_header: Now let us be merry both all and some
_description: A macaronic Christmas poem — three quatrains

BLHar2942.First Lines:
Now let vs be mery bothe all and someffrome heven and hyghe all
                    tydinges vs com…
BLHar2942.Last Lines:
…He cam downe frome heven þat hygh SitieTo delyver vs
                    frome captivitieypse est proprio sanguineKirielayson

Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “An English Nativity Song from a Latin Processional.” 
             American Notes and Queries
         n.s. 11 [209] (1964): 147-9: 148.
